name: Wamble On
description:
WAMBLE ON

An arcade game to test your focus and timing skills! If you think you are resistant to nausea... think again!

EASY

Calming yet slightly nauseating experience. [1 Point per dodge]

NORMAL

Little dangerous and faster dive to nausea. [2 Points per dodge]

HARD

True nausea... the way it's meant to be played! [5 Points per dodge]

NOTE: Scores are not saved! Just experience and dive in. Please do take short breaks as this game can be harmful to your senses.
